eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyInfo: Zubayr awakens countless constructs to restore the city into the treasure trove he once guarded. He then entrusts the two Sovereigns of Beasts with putting both Narantuya and Pepe through a trial.

attributes.content: In the stuffy summer heat, a girl sits at her desk, one hand sorting through a thick stack of reference materials while the other wipes sweat from her forehead.
She hears footsteps behind her but doesn't bother to turn around.
There are almonds on the desk, but he already knows.
Why are you still reading, my dear sister?
It's such a fine and sunny afternoon, my dear sister! Let's go play outside!
You don't plan to sit with your nose in those dusty papyrus scrolls your entire life do you, my dear sister?
I talked to Father, my dear sister. He said he would consider making me the Historian of Shar-Agade.
Being a padishah isn't so bad, my dear sister. So just give up already.
Enough! Stop bothering me, you little pest!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: She quickly turns her head, but there is nobody behind her...
Only the scroll she tossed at her brother, sprawled out on the floor.
Are you there, Pepe? Quick, let me in!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I'm here, come in.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I've been sending you messages on the communicator. Why didn't you respond?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I turned it off. I've been looking at books and scrolls all night. What happened?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: A lot happened last night. Did you seriously not hear a thing holed up in here?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Nope. Didn't hear a peep.
attributes.name: Pepe
Medjehtiqedti
attributes.content: You sealing yourself away to work is really...

attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti
attributes.content: Forget it, I don't even know where to start.
attributes.joined: You sealing yourself away to work is really... Forget it, I don't even know where to start.

attributes.content: Just hear it yourself.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Emergencies across multiple districts of Menat.
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: Many metallic humanoid constructs have broken into homes and stolen large quantities of gems.
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: Residents have reported these robberies to the city guard, and the captain assures us that an investigation is currently underway.
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: Metallic humanoid constructs...?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: According to an eyewitness, he saw these metallic constructs breaking out from the museum last night...
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Well... Everything I wanted to say, the radio already said.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Anat says the museum staff followed their tracks and ended up at the Grand Bazaar.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Is this Zubayr's doing?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: We suspect so, but nobody's seen him at all lately. You were in contact with him the longest. Could you help us look for him?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Got it. I'll head over right away.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: What about you and Anat?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: We're in charge of the museum, we have to find all the artifacts.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: We're going to head out and have a look ourselves.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: If I find anything, I'll let you two know. Be seeing you.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Err, hold on, we interrupt this program for some breaking news.
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: Residents have noticed the water coming out of their taps is muddy and full of silt.
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: The city guard reports that they have dispatched emergency teams to inspect the city's old underground water pipes. Due to their complexity, this process will take some time...
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: Just what is going on here?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Someone has already told me the tale of this place.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The prosperity of the Grand Bazaar is borne upon gems, alongside spices, silks, and crafts, all flowing through the river of commerce to bestow riches upon this land.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The gem trading post and the gems with unusual Originium circuits have transformed Menat-Ha'mait into a morning star on the crown of sand...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Several houses begin to turn into sand. People throw open their windows or rush out their doors, staring in disbelief at the ancient buildings they have lived in for generations, and then at Zubayr, who stands in the middle of the street.
But Zubayr pays them no heed.
He stoops down and picks up a piece of jewelry from the pooling sands, its gem glinting within the metallic helix structure under the sun.
The fresco you mentioned is straight ahead, Zubayr Effendi.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: My mother's father once told me that the painting depicts the lives of ancient Sargonians and records the birth of Menat-Ha'mait.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: 'Even if the river dries, and the city is buried beneath the sands, it will not fade.'
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: ...'Will not fade', indeed. Just like every gem that has passed your hand and mine.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: But it was neither dried river nor burial by sand that brought calamity to the city of yore.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: But a flood that destroyed even the peaks of the grand edifices. What remained of their splendor was eventually buried by the sands, becoming a secret of a thousand years.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Each rise of the sun and fall of the moons is a tiny repeat of the endless cycle.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The brevity of a day and the span of a lifetime...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The birth of a new city, the fall of an empire, and mountains to dust, are but all similar repetitions.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Effendi, if I may. I believe that while the fresco captures only a fleeting moment from centuries past, its value lies in that this moment will be repeated countless times to its beholders.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: The Shah ordered this fresco made not to ensure his name would be remembered throughout history.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: He hoped to leave behind his interpretations of time and life. To serve as a foundation that the people yet to come could imitate.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Here did the Shah of Past and Future build his trove, and so it was that during the long Aslan Wars, which raged after his death, countless lords ameer coveted this place.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Until the hellish heat waves from the far south brought great change to the climate. A devastating flood ensued, toppling walls, diverting rivers, and leaving the land forever scarred.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: And so the people searched the sands for traces of the trove, but found nothing. Thus did they believe it was washed away in the deluge.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The treasure hunters of the lords ameer left, but the artisans and merchants came, establishing a new settlement by the riverside.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I have been watchful of all that transpires here.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I was ordered to guard the trove. That is my duty.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I dwelled beneath the sands, fending off miscreants who dared approach for countless moons.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: As for you, young one, you should know better than any other: the Shah's treasure trove lies beneath this city.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: 'Fourth, the liver. We go into the night, awake and alert, for duty and obligation.' ...I thank you for returning this gem to me. It has restored more of my memories.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The treasure trove started with tens of thousands of skilled craftsmen gathering at the then-desolate Menat-Ha'mait.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: From majestic labyrinths made of gold to hand-crafted gems inlaid with Originium circuits, the artificers created them all and buried them beneath the sands.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Later generations mostly believed that after exhausting all their energies on their work, these artisans were all buried alongside their creations.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: But in truth, some still lived in a secluded village to the southwest of Menat-Ha'mait, and for many generations, they guarded the secret of the trove's entrance.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It is now your turn to speak, young one.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: What follows next involves the story of your family.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The young overseer shuts his eyes tight, as though drowning in the heavy sands of memory.
The tale has been passed down from generation to generation, seared into the mind like the scorching sun above the desert.
Its heat burning, singeing, and blistering.
Three hundred years ago, an army comprised of the forces of many lords ameer and padishahs found that village.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: They interrogated the villagers on the location of the trove's entrance, cutting the hands off of anyone who refused to speak.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: A gemwright who had already lost his hands could no longer bear to see more of his kin suffer, so he approached the army and proposed to lead the way.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Before the trove, he watched the terrible battle between the army and its guardian unfold. He saw that though the guardian was defeated, the gates would not open without his Arts.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: The furious army cut open the guardian's chest, plundering every gem inlaid within and without his body.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Although the gemwright used every technique he knew to guide his young child in restoring the guardian, he never woke up.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: After that, a set of scales was set up in the Grand Bazaar of Menat-Ha'mait. Once an adult, the gemwright's child buried the guardian, then established a trading post specializing in gems.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: His descendants have been waiting there ever since.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Every generation did all they could to ensure Menat-Ha'mait's gem trade would become even more prosperous.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Whether it takes a hundred years or a thousand, the day will come when the people scour the sands of Sargon, and all the gems will gather in this city once more...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: ...And I shall return them to you.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: The overseer dares not open his eyes as he feels Zubayr's sistrum press upon his chest.
Yet, visions of centuries passing flash before him in an instant.
He witnesses suns rise and moons fall, cities flourish and then crumble, returning to the sands from which they came.
He sees the ancient guardian walking in the boundless desert.
The guardian spreads his arms, basking in the light of the stars, facing eastwards to welcome the sunrise.
Feeling watched, the guardian looks down and meets the young overseer's eyes.
Under his merciful gaze, the overseer trembles.
He trembles in anticipation of the momentous words the guardian is about to utter.
Your family's journey for penitence has been long indeed...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You are all free now.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It has been quite a while, you two.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Many centuries have I forgotten my duty, but now I return to the mortal realm. I, alongside this city, shall make up for the time we have squandered.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: But at the same time, I have a request, and I hope the two of you will agree to see it through.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: If that Nightzmora truly is the descendent of Kharanduu Khagan, then I will honor the Shah's promise and open the trove for her.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Woof, aid me in ascertaining her lineage.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Leave it to me.
attributes.name: Woof

attributes.content: I must put her to the test as well. If she is ultimately incapable of completing her Khaganquest, she will never be considered a true Nightzmora.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: No matter what may come, make sure she takes that step.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Woof

attributes.content: Do I have to go as well? I never thought those Nightzmora were any good.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: There are too many drunks among them, spilling their drinks all over the place. I don't feel like having to lick my fur clean again.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: No, Mio. I need you to aid me with another matter.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Out with it, young one.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: After I sank into slumber, the Shah's treasure trove suffered heavy damage. A dereliction of my duty.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I must admit that even with the constructs at my side, my strength would not be enough to hold back the combined armies of the lords ameer and the padishahs.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Just tell me your decision. I'll get it done for you, like I always do.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: I met a girl. I believe she can help me.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Following the footsteps of the Shah, she found one of my lost gems. If not for her, I would not have awakened.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Oh, you mean that kid? I've seen her, seemed like a good egg.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Motivated, lively... too bad she's a little too stubborn.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Reminds me of her.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Indeed. After searching through my memories, the girl's conduct and demeanor feel rather familiar.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: She reminds me of my elder sister. When we walked down the streets of the City of Gold, she could tell me the origin of every brick and tile.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: She was especially fascinated by the things of yore.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: What do you want me to do with the girl, Zubayr?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: I need a companion. One who will await the Shah's return alongside me.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Help me confirm if she is worthy, Mio.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: If that's your wish, Zubayr.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Then I shall go.
attributes.name: Mio
